subtitle: Walrus Notes - your reliable companion in the ocean of ideas. Create notes, build connections between them, and discover new horizons of thinking with an intuitive knowledge graph.

features.visualThinkingDesc: Transform text notes into interactive visual maps
features.fastOrganizationDesc: Instantly structure ideas with drag and drop
features.smartConnectionsDesc: Automatically find and create connections between notes
features.secureStorageDesc: Your data is protected and synced across devices
features.collaborationDesc: Work together on projects in real time
